timeline.message: Validate blocks against weakSubjectivity validator before importing

timeline.bodyText: nit: It might be nice to log a warning if the chain moved passed the wsCheckpoint since we can't verify it anymore.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Yeah - the thought crossed my mind as well.  But we should be gating all imports with these checks, and validating consistency with the wsCheckpoint at startup, which should prevent us from following an inconsistent chain.  The only way we hit this is if we don't have the parent of the block being imported (which will get validated later), or the wsCheckpoint has fallen off behind the latest finalized block. Given that this is an expected case and could get really noisey, I thought it was best to just move on here.
replies.author: mbaxter
